subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: In his third crack in seven nights at joining Patrick Roy as the only goaltenders in N.H.L. history to win 500 games, Martin Brodeur did not get much help.
snippet: In his third crack in seven nights at joining Patrick Roy as the only goaltenders in N.H.L. history to win 500 games, Martin Brodeur did not get much help.
